channel.title: I can't connect to any server
channel.description: I know this will sound really basic but everytime i try to connect to a server i just says its down. So i look at the server status page...that says its up. I am feeling really stupid so can someone please help me?

item.title: I can't connect to any server
item.dc:creator: @inugotha inugotha
item.description:
@inugotha wrote:

i cant get into my own whats happenin, and how do i get in servers with other people what do i do??

Read full topic

item.title: I can't connect to any server
item.dc:creator: @Owneh Owneh
item.description:
@Owneh wrote:

[quote=“Battleman021, post:9, topic:29087”]yea same… no 1 can join my server… i got a good pk source to… i just think its the firewall but no1 is on to see if it is :[/quote] Have you done port forwarding? And you guys who cant get on servers, are you on the right version? USe the forums and get ips AND Ports, if that doesnt work go on Start>Controll panel>Network connections>
Localhost 1 (Or if this isnt there 1st one you see) >Right click>Properties>Advanced i think it is, at the top right,> Then look for allow people to connect from the internet from this computer and check that. Now try.

Read full topic

item.title: I can't connect to any server
item.dc:creator: @master_rune master rune
item.description:
@master_rune wrote:

FireWall, it allows people to connect, if you do not do this the firewall wil lblock them and the server will seem offline

item.title: I can't connect to any server
item.dc:creator: @boij7 boij7
item.description:
@boij7 wrote:

Maybe u need the latest java. U need to click the exceptions tab in firewall option n change it to 43594 and if u using no-ip DUC it will work if u using hamachi u need a pass n other ppls user n pass n ip…

                                                                            REP If hElPFULL
